languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy without hitting the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin gains +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next turn.
languages.original_text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g} не в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} получает +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin hits an enemy without hitting the enemy's opening, the Assassin gains +<u>2×(AGI bonus)%</u> dodge until the start of their next turn.
Whenever the Assassin hits an enemy without hitting the enemy's opening, the Assassin gains +<u>2×(AGI bonus)</u>% dodge until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Нанося удар не в слабое место, ассасин получает +<u>(2 × бонус ЛВК)</u>% к уклонению до начала своего следующего хода.
Нанося удар не в слабое место, ассасин получает +<u>(2 × бонус ЛВК)</u>% к уклонению до начала своего следующего хода.
Нанося удар не в слабое место, ассасин получает +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人，但未能命中敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy without hitting the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin gains +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当刺客命中敌人，但未能命中敌人的破绽时，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高<u>2×（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
每当刺客命中敌人，但未能命中敌人的破绽时，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpee{/g} a un enemigo sin impactar en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, gana un +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy without hitting the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin gains +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpee{/g} a un enemigo sin impactar en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, gana un +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

Cada vez que el asesino golpee a un enemigo sin impactar en su zona desprotegida, gana un +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, ohne dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} zu treffen, erhält der Assassine +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy without hitting the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin gains +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, ohne dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} zu treffen, erhält der Assassine +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}.

Immer wenn der Assassine einen Gegner trifft, ohne dessen Blöße zu treffen, erhält der Assassine +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Beginn seiner nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} porte un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} à un ennemi sans toucher la {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} effectuée sur celui-ci, il gagne +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy without hitting the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin gains +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin porte un coup à un ennemi sans toucher la brèche effectuée sur celui-ci, il gagne +<u>2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

Chaque fois que l'Assassin porte un coup à un ennemi sans toucher la brèche effectuée sur celui-ci, il gagne +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}に命中させずに攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させるたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで+{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy without hitting the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin gains +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵の隙に命中させずに攻撃を命中させるたびに、アサシンは次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで+<u>2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を得る。
敵の隙に命中させずに攻撃を命中させるたびに、アサシンは次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで+{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を得る。
